title: Get a Free Sports Car
headline: Get a Free Sports Car
subtitle: Scan the QR Code to claim
content: Legendary Motorsport is clearing out their surplus inventory of Obey 8F Drafter sports cars by any means necessary, and you can reserve a free one for yourself. Scan the QR Code to visit our site and sign in to your Rockstar Games account by March 18. After successfully claiming, come back to GTA Online between March 21 and April 3 to get it free from the Legendary Motorsport in-game website.
